definitions.definition: A large flat-bottomed towed or self-propelled boat used mainly for river and canal transport of heavy goods or bulk cargo.
A richly decorated ceremonial state vessel propelled by rowers for river processions .
A large flat-bottomed coastal trading vessel having a large spritsail and jib -headed topsail , a fore staysail and a very small mizen , and having leeboards instead of a keel .
One of the boats of a warship having fourteen oars
The wooden disk in which bread or biscuit is placed on a mess table .
A double-decked passenger or freight vessel , towed by a steamboat .
A large bus used for excursions .

main_definition: ( nautical ) A large flat-bottomed towed or self-propelled boat used mainly for river and canal transport of heavy goods or bulk cargo.
secondary_definitions: A richly decorated ceremonial state vessel propelled by rowers for river processions .
A large flat-bottomed coastal trading vessel having a large spritsail and jib -headed topsail , a fore staysail and a very small mizen , and having leeboards instead of a keel .
One of the boats of a warship having fourteen oars
The wooden disk in which bread or biscuit is placed on a mess table .
( US ) A double-decked passenger or freight vessel , towed by a steamboat .
( US , dialect , dated , historical ) A large bus used for excursions .
